sources.title: Children’s Christmas Stories (2005) Bedtime stories
sources.description:
This collection of tales has been put together to take you on a magical journey into the wonderful world of make-believe. Christmas stories include: “The Elves and the Shoemaker,” “The Spirits of Christmas” (based on “A Christmas Story” by Charles Dickens) and the all-new “The Day that Santa was Kidnapped.”

Director & Narrator: Liam Dale
Genres: Christmas, Short stories

00:00 Narrator Introduction
01:29 The elves & the shoemaker
18:28 The spirit of christmas
42:19 The day santa was kidnapped

@CultCinemaClassics
